short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChattyUI - your private AI chat for running LLMs in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatty is your private AI that runs large language models (LLMs) natively & privately in your browser, bringing you the most feature rich in-browser AI experience. This extension offers Chatty as a sidebar in Chrome.
